PersonalStatement.text: Connie Williams, born on 1968-03-01, is a Female based in New Nicholas, Faroe Islands. She is Divorced and holds Swiss nationality. Currently working at Johnson PLC.

WorkExperience.text: Financial Analyst at Little, Lynch and Bradley from 2005 to 2019.
Senior Financial Analyst at Johnson PLC, 2019 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Civil Engineering from Suranaree University of Technology
Master's in Engineering from University of California, Irvine

PersonalSkills.text: Adaptability: Able to quickly learn and implement new technologies.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys reading.
